Attributes.description: Principles of hydrology at site, watershed, and larger regional scales. Introduction to techniques of measurement and analysis. Emphasizes surface water hydrology of western North America.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of GEOB 200, GEOS 200, GEOB 204, GEOS 204, APBI 244, ATSC 201. (And one of PHYS 100-level or CHEM 123.)
